cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4.1)

add_definitions(-DFFMPEG_CONFIGURATION=NULL)
add_definitions(-DWEBRTC_USE_H264_AS_DEBUG=1)

include_directories(
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/chromium/config/Chrome/android/arm64
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/opus/src/include
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg
)

set(src_ffmpeg_arm64
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/ac3_parser.c
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/ac3tab.c
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/adts_parser.c

        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/aarch64/h264dsp_init_aarch64.c
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/aarch64/h264qpel_init_aarch64.c
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/aarch64/autorename_libavcodec_aarch64_h264cmc_neon.S
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/aarch64/autorename_libavcodec_aarch64_h264dsp_neon.S
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/aarch64/autorename_libavcodec_aarch64_h264idct_neon.S
        ${WEBRTC_REPO}/third_party/ffmpeg/libavcodec/aarch64/autorename_libavcodec_aarch64_h264qpel_neon.S
        )

add_library(ffmpeg STATIC
        ${src_ffmpeg_arm64}
        )
